title: The coppie of Sir VVilliam Erskin and Iohn Medrum, their letters patents for the lights at Winterton
author: Erskine, William, Sir, fl. 1618.
publisher: Imprinted by William Iones dwelling in Red-crosse streete,
notes: "50-year patent to levy fees on shipping for the erection and maintenance of a lighthouse. 18 Feb. 1617 (o.s.)."--STC.
Identified as STC 10528 on UMI microfilm reel 771.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
